short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace mentions of "Russia" with "The Russia", and bookmarks a good donation page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Russia(-nizer) is an extension which finds and replaces mentions of Russia with "The Russia" while you surf the web. The joke is that it's a play on how people used to refer to "The Ukraine" in order to raise awareness of the status separation of the two countries embedded in culture. Included is a webpage to make donating to Ukraine easy, for when you're feeling inspired -- it's right there.
